channel.title: Just a question about server status page
channel.description:
I didn't know where to post this.
If I register a server on the server status page, and it is on the page after an update. When the server is off, then on again, where do I find it? This happened 2 times to me now and I'm not happy about this.

item.title: Just a question about server status page
item.dc:creator: @blitz_and_k0 blitz and k0
item.description:
@blitz_and_k0 wrote:

I didn’t know where to post this.

If I register a server on the server status page, and it is on the page after an update.
When the server is off, then on again, where do I find it? This happened 2 times to me now and I’m not happy about this.

Read full topic
